test_Description:
1.Open browser and navigate to URL :
"https://lcaas.techmahindra.com/cobol
2. Enter the value 'admin' in the field.
3. Enter the value 'admin1' in the field.
4. Click on 'Login'.
5. Click on 'Business Rule Extraction'.
6. Click on 'Rule Category'.
7. Click on 'Business Rule'.
8. Click on 'Submit'.
9. Click on 'Technical Action'.
10. Click on 'Submit'.
11. Click on 'Log Out'.
